tags: None
review:
Doctor is excellent no doubt about it.   

 But hospital staffs are not well organised with appointments.  Practo is not that great app to fix appointment. I had fixed for 11 am but scheduled for 1.30.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
It's a late post though.. I had been consulting Dr Jyothi fdurimg my pregnancy, it's Ivf dcda twin pregnancy. She was friendly enough from day 1 . Mine was high risk pregnancy with endometriosis so I had got all extra care and support from the Doctor all the time. Our monthly scans were smooth and everythin went well for 7 months. My water level was high and was put on rest in 7 month, I was also informed by Doctor if going innearly labour anytym after 33 weeks. We went for my scan and everythin looked fine and came home the next day I got pain and was rushed to hospital in the early mrg 4. In 10 mins Dr Jyothi was there to see me . This is her dedication and the most important thing was one of her hand was fractured, she didn't give up on her patients even then.. as I mentioned it was high risk pregnancy and I wasn't due still .. It was my week 34 and Doctor Jyothi tried everything to support me and controlling my pain levels i was given steroids for withstanding pregnancy but my body gave up andmy bp was shooting up and sodium level imbalance and endo cyst broke inside complications were increasing .. the whole day I was under observation trying to postpone the delivery but once Doctor saw my reports she came running to me in the midnight with her fractured hand and informed us that I needed to deliver at the earliest. It was 11 pm in the night.. whole night Doctor was with me monitoring my CTG and repeated scans to check baby s health .. she slept on a strecher that night outside the OT I don't know which doctor would do this for her patients..  her level of dedication is somethin i havent seen anywre..  early morning I was taken for emergency c sec and I delivered healthy twins babies . She was there through each sec of my battle in this. 

Strongly recommend Dr Jyothi.

tags: None
review: I visited Dr. Shenoy during my 6th of pregnancy as recommended by a friend of mine. I had smooth pregnancy and was expecting a normal delivery. Same was encouraged by the doctor too. On the delivery day my water broke too soon early in the morning. Still the doc was ready to wait till late evening for normal delivery and assured me that she'll be there throughout. She remained positive even when baby had pooped inside and wanted to wait still. But baby had other plans and got very agitated inside, her heart rate dropped to half and the pains grew unbearable. She was called immediately and within 10min the entire team was there to do the C-section. My baby girl was safely delivered and I was encouraged to breastfeed right away. I would recommend Dr. Jyothi to everyone.

tags: None
review:
To anyone who is reading this review and in case anyone plans to consult this doctor, I would strongly urge that you reconsider your decision. I consulted Dr. Jyothi Shenoy for my wife when we were expecting our second baby.

****** ** *** ***** *** *** ******** ** ************* ****** *** ************ ******* **** *** we decided to change the doctor eventually. And am not the only one *** ********** *** ******* ***** **** ***** ***** *** ***** ********** *** ****** ********* *** ******** ** ** *********** *********** ***** *** ***** ************ ******* ***** ** *** ****** ** ******* ** **** *** **** ***** *** **** when we did not bow down to the pressure. ** ** ****** *** ** *** *** *********** **** **** *** ********* ** ***** ******* ** **** ****** She did little to comfort my wife *** ***** *** **** ** ********** *** ***** It was very natural for us to visit columbia asia in yeshwanthpur as that is one of the prominent hospitals but I would strongly advise everyone to avoid this hospital and especially this doctor. ***** **** *** ** ** ****** *********** ***** ******** ** **** ******* **** *********** ***** **** *** **** ********* ** **** *** ************ *********
This was when all the previous tests were normal. When we went to the other hospital, *** ******** **** **** *** *** ****** ******* ***** *** *** ****** *** ******** ********* *** ** *** *** **** ********* ***** ** **** *** ******** *** **** ***** ***** ** ******* *** **** ** **** *** * ******Am happy to tell you that my decision to change the doctor was right and the baby was born without any complications whatsoever just like I had thought. Both the mother and the baby are fine and the baby was born at full term sans any complications. All subsequent tests were fine.********* **** *** ****** ** ******* ** ********** *** ** ** ****** ******* **** *** *** *** *** ****** ******* ********** ** ***** *** *** ***** ** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Jyothi Shenoy is very friendly who treats patients like her family members. She explains each and everything very clearly. She responds to email very quickly inspite her very busy schedule.  
Though I had little complications in my pregnancy she monitored my very closely and she made my 9 months very smooth. I had Normal Vaginal delivery. She was extremely supportive during delivery. Best Gynac!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Jyothi is our guiding light for having through us with our first born. A cheerful person who carefully studied my wife's case and ensured that she shall stick till the last and she kept her every word. With certain complexities with my wife's case we certainly were quite scared but in her hands we really felt safe. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Jyothi maâ€™am, is master in her space. I had a difficult pregnancy, but under her treatment I was able to deliver a healthy baby . My recovery post C-section was also very quick , all big thanks to her

In case you are looking for a gynaecologist in bangalore she is for sure your go to doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I always insisted on normal vaginal delivery..she smiled and said we will try but never guaranteed as it cannot be assured till the delivery time comes since there are many more complications invloved. She responded quickly over mails.even when my pain started, I told her about my symptomps via mail.She responded within few minutes and asked me to go to labour room.
I had normal vaginal delivery.All thanks to their team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is very good doctor I ever found she never recommended any unnecessary medication or unnecessary test she explains each nd every process in detail and take care of the patients like hers own family member very dedicated very rare to see such doctor i recommend each and every one to her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Manipal Hospital has a well-equipped gastroenterology department with experienced doctors and staff, Dr. Jyothi Shenoy  mam in terms of treatment, uses advanced technologies and follows evidence-based guidelines to diagnose and treat stomach ache. She generally prioritize non-invasive treatment methods such as medication, lifestyle changes, and diet modification before considering surgery. This approach ensures that patients have access to high-quality, comprehensive care.

The staff Jhansi is approachable and readily available to attend to the patients' concerns, which makes for a comfortable and stress-free treatment process.

Overall, Manipal Hospital has a reputation for providing exceptional care to their patients, and based on their gastroenterology department's approach to treating stomach ache, I would highly recommend the hospital for anyone seeking treatment for their stomach-related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** **** ********* **** * *** **** ** ** ** ************ ** ********** during my 5th month I came to colombia Asia.. . She cares us so much.... takes time for each  consultation... she do scold if we dnt take proper care like our mother... but I had a promise that she has to attend my delivery and I was screaming out of pain and really wanted a c - section... wherein my delivery was complicated too... i got a normal delivery...its all bcoz of my favourite doctor... even today my mom says she came out of delivery room and console her and said not to worry... never  doctor does this...  for all to be mom u will be safe in her hands...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ***** *** ** *** **** ************** * ***** I had a vaginal delivery at Columbia Asia hospital..All I can say is I couldn't have done it if Dr.Jyothi hadn't encouraged me to do it.. She never forced me to take unnecessary medication throughout my pregnancy and never forced me to do a C-sec! Sure,I was asked to take a few tests but it was for the baby's health and mine. You can go ahead and trust her completely. She does her best to make you feel confident and stay positive during the entire delivery process. I can't thank her enough for her patience and everything!! She's not only great doctor but a fine human being too!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My friend had recommended Dr. Shenoy for my pregnancy check up and delivery. And i am extremely grateful to her ******* *** ****** ** *** **** ************* * **** ********* *** She motivated me for normal delivery from day one and always listened to my fear. Even when i was unable to bear the contractions pain and husband insisted to get caesarean, she was the one who kept me motivated for normal. And i am glad i heard her. Now i am a mother of a baby boy with almost no postpartum complications and all credits to her. We are thankful to her till date.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We thank each and every staff of Columbia Asia Hospital, Yeshwanthpur for giving second life to my wife. Really it's an extraordinary and exemplary service and treatment given by the Gynaecologist Dr. Jyothi Shenoy and her team. It was an emergency situation and we came to Columbia Asia.  Doctors and their team in the emergency were exceptional. Dr. Jyothi Shenoy stayed up the whole night in the hospital. She is very good Doctor. The service and decision from emergency to discharge was excellent and the life was saved. We are very lucky to get a doctor like this. Doctor thank you very much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ******* Received best suggestions, care like a mother, optimum dedication and service. Can blindly recommend to visit her out of personal experience for labour and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
she was very supportive, she would show the patient the right path . I was very glad to meet her.
Tq so much doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: She is a god sent doctor to treat my rare case of severe preeclampsia where I had extremely high blood pressure, splitting headache, blinding vision and severe vomiting. The doctor and the entire team of labour took really  good care of me. I really recommend this doctor as she saved my life

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am extreamly happy with the methodology Dr Shenoy adopted to look into my case.  She explained me the line of treatment and also took minimal *** ********* diagnostic technique to pin point the issue. She was with her team during my operation and took a great care of me. I am glad my case was handled.by her. I strongly recommend her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** ** ***** ** *** ******  Mine was a high risk pregnancy still she motivated me to have normal delivery.. By  God's grace and her efforts i delivered a healthy baby.. She is dedicated and takes care of patience very well.. Thank you so much Dr.. Can't forget you in our lives...
